Rulings.HAT:
● Special Summoning and losing LP happen simultaneously (nothing will miss its timing)
You can read more about conjunctions here: [link being updated]post/conjunctions
● Even if one target leaves the GY, the others are still Summoned.
You can read more about that here: [link being updated]post/both-those-them
● This card can be activated on the first turn of the Duel, but never during your Main Phase 2.
● If your Battle Phase is being skipped by some effect, you can still activate this card.
However, you will skip your next Battle Phase instead.
